title: Master Power BI with UNIQ Technologies
subtitle: Become an expert in Business Intelligence and Data Visualization using Microsoft's Power BI. This course covers Data Modeling, DAX, Power Query, Dashboards, and Real-Time Project Implementations. Designed for freshers, analysts, and professionals who want to build a strong career in data-driven decision-making.

afterCompleted.description: Power BI professionals are in huge demand across industries like IT, finance, healthcare, and e-commerce. After completing this course, you can apply for:

faq.question: What is Power BI?
faq.answer: Power BI is a business intelligence tool by Microsoft used for data visualization, reporting, and interactive dashboards.

faq.question: Is this course suitable for beginners?
faq.answer: Yes. No prior experience is required. We start from basics of data handling and visualization.

faq.question: What will I learn in this course?
faq.answer: You will learn Power Query, DAX formulas, Data Modeling, Dashboard Design, Power BI Service, and integrating Power BI with Excel and SQL.

faq.question: Do I need programming knowledge?
faq.answer: No. Power BI requires logic and analytical thinking, not programming.

faq.question: Do you provide placement assistance?
faq.answer: Yes! UNIQ Technologies offers 100% placement support until you get placed.

faq.question: Will I work on real-time projects?
faq.answer: Yes. You will build dashboards for Sales, HR, Finance, and Marketing datasets.

faq.question: Can I attend both online and offline?
faq.answer: Yes. You can switch between modes anytime without extra fees.

faq.question: How long is the Power BI course?
faq.answer: The course duration is 1.5–2 months depending on batch type.

faq.question: Do I receive certificates?
faq.answer: Yes, both Course Completion and Internship Certificates are provided.

faq.question: Is Power BI in demand?
faq.answer: Yes! Power BI is one of the most in-demand BI tools used across industries.
